   20: -module(logger_env_var_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -compile(export_all).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("kernel/include/logger.hrl").
   25: -include_lib("kernel/src/logger_internal.hrl").
   26: 
   27: -import(logger_test_lib,[setup/2,log/3,sync_and_read/3]).
   28: 
   29: suite() ->
   30:     [{timetrap, {seconds, 60}}].
   31: 
   32: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   33:     Config.
   34: 
   35: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   36:     ok.
   37: 
   38: groups() ->
   39:     [{error_logger,[],[error_logger_tty,
   40:                        error_logger_tty_sasl_compatible,
   41:                        error_logger_false,
   42:                        error_logger_false_progress,
   43:                        error_logger_false_sasl_compatible,
   44:                        error_logger_silent,
   45:                        error_logger_silent_sasl_compatible,
   46:                        error_logger_file]},
   47:      {logger,[],[logger_file,
   48:                  logger_file_sasl_compatible,
   49:                  logger_file_log_progress,
   50:                  logger_file_no_filter,
   51:                  logger_file_no_filter_level,
   52:                  logger_file_formatter,
   53:                  logger_filters,
   54:                  logger_filters_stop,
   55:                  logger_module_level,
   56:                  logger_disk_log,
   57:                  logger_disk_log_formatter,
   58:                  logger_undefined,
   59:                  logger_many_handlers_default_first,
   60:                  logger_many_handlers_default_last,
   61:                  logger_many_handlers_default_last_broken_filter,
   62:                  logger_proxy,
   63:                  logger_metadata
   64:                 ]},
   65:      {bad,[],[bad_error_logger,
   66:               bad_level,
   67:               bad_sasl_compatibility]}].
   68: 
   69: all() ->
   70:     [default,
   71:      default_sasl_compatible,
   72:      sasl_compatible_false,
   73:      sasl_compatible_false_no_progress,
   74:      sasl_compatible,
   75:      all_logger_level,
   76:      {group,bad},
   77:      {group,error_logger},
   78:      {group,logger}
   79:     ].
   80: 
   81: default(Config) ->
   82:     {ok, #{primary := P, handlers := Hs, module_levels := ML}, Peer, _Node} = setup(Config, []),
   83:     notice = maps:get(level,P),
   84:     true = #{} == maps:get(metadata,P),
   85:     #{module:=logger_std_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
   86:     all = maps:get(level,StdC),
   87:     StdFilters = maps:get(filters,StdC),
   88:     {domain,{_,{log,super,[otp,sasl]}}} = lists:keyfind(domain,1,StdFilters),
   89:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
   90:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
   91:     [] = ML,
   92:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
   93: 
   94: default_sasl_compatible(Config) ->
   95:     {ok, #{primary := P, handlers := Hs, module_levels := ML}, Peer, _Node} =
   96:         setup(Config, [{logger_sasl_compatible, true}]),
   97:     info = maps:get(level,P),
   98:     #{module:=logger_std_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
   99:     all = maps:get(level,StdC),
  100:     StdFilters = maps:get(filters,StdC),
  101:     {domain,{_,{log,super,[otp]}}} = lists:keyfind(domain,1,StdFilters),
  102:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  103:     true = exists(sasl,Hs),
  104:     [] = ML,
  105:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  106: 
  107: error_logger_tty(Config) ->
  108:     {ok, #{primary := P, handlers := Hs, module_levels := ML}, Peer, _Node} =
  109:         setup(Config, [{error_logger, tty}]),
  110:     notice = maps:get(level,P),
  111:     #{module:=logger_std_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  112:     all = maps:get(level,StdC),
  113:     StdFilters = maps:get(filters,StdC),
  114:     {domain,{_,{log,super,[otp,sasl]}}} = lists:keyfind(domain,1,StdFilters),
  115:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  116:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  117:     [] = ML,
  118:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  119: 
  120: error_logger_tty_sasl_compatible(Config) ->
  121:     {ok, #{primary := P, handlers := Hs, module_levels := ML}, Peer, _Node} =
  122:         setup(Config,
  123:               [{error_logger,tty},
  124:                {logger_sasl_compatible,true}]),
  125:     info = maps:get(level,P),
  126:     #{module:=logger_std_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  127:     all = maps:get(level,StdC),
  128:     StdFilters = maps:get(filters,StdC),
  129:     {domain,{_,{log,super,[otp]}}} = lists:keyfind(domain,1,StdFilters),
  130:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  131:     true = exists(sasl,Hs),
  132:     [] = ML,
  133:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  134: 
  135: error_logger_false(Config) ->
  136:     {ok, #{handlers := Hs, primary := P, module_levels := ML}, Peer, _Node} =
  137:         setup(Config,
  138:               [{error_logger,false},
  139:                {logger_level,notice}]),
  140:     false = exists(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  141:     #{module:=logger_simple_h} = SimpleC = find(simple,Hs),
  142:     all = maps:get(level,SimpleC),
  143:     notice = maps:get(level,P),
  144:     SimpleFilters = maps:get(filters,SimpleC),
  145:     {domain,{_,{log,super,[otp,sasl]}}} = lists:keyfind(domain,1,SimpleFilters),
  146:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  147:     [] = ML,
  148:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  149: 
  150: error_logger_false_progress(Config) ->
  151:     {ok, #{handlers := Hs, primary := P, module_levels := ML}, Peer, _Node} =
  152:         setup(Config,
  153:               [{error_logger,false},
  154:                {logger_level,notice}]),
  155:     false = exists(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  156:     #{module:=logger_simple_h} = SimpleC = find(simple,Hs),
  157:     all = maps:get(level,SimpleC),
  158:     notice = maps:get(level,P),
  159:     SimpleFilters = maps:get(filters,SimpleC),
  160:     {domain,{_,{log,super,[otp,sasl]}}} = lists:keyfind(domain,1,SimpleFilters),
  161:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  162:     [] = ML,
  163:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  164: 
  165: error_logger_false_sasl_compatible(Config) ->
  166:     {ok, #{handlers := Hs, primary := P, module_levels := ML}, Peer, _Node} =
  167:         setup(Config,
  168:               [{error_logger,false},
  169:                {logger_level,notice},
  170:                {logger_sasl_compatible,true}]),
  171:     false = exists(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  172:     #{module:=logger_simple_h} = SimpleC = find(simple,Hs),
  173:     all = maps:get(level,SimpleC),
  174:     info = maps:get(level,P),
  175:     SimpleFilters = maps:get(filters,SimpleC),
  176:     {domain,{_,{log,super,[otp]}}} = lists:keyfind(domain,1,SimpleFilters),
  177:     true = exists(sasl,Hs),
  178:     [] = ML,
  179:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  180: 
  181: error_logger_silent(Config) ->
  182:     {ok, #{handlers := Hs}, Peer, _Node} = setup(Config,
  183:         [{error_logger, silent}]),
  184:     false = exists(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  185:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  186:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  187:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  188: 
  189: error_logger_silent_sasl_compatible(Config) ->
  190:     {ok, #{handlers := Hs}, Peer, _Node} = setup(Config,
  191:                                        [{error_logger,silent},
  192:                                         {logger_sasl_compatible,true}]),
  193:     false = exists(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  194:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  195:     true = exists(sasl,Hs),
  196:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  197: 
  198: 
  199: error_logger_file(Config) ->
  200:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  201:     {ok, _, Peer, Node} = setup(Config,
  202:                         [{error_logger,{file,Log}}]),
  203:     check_default_log(Node,Log,
  204:                       file,% dest
  205:                       0),% progress in std logger
  206:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  207: 
  208: 
  209: logger_file(Config) ->
  210:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  211:     {ok, #{primary := P, handlers := Hs, module_levels := ML}, Peer, Node}
  212:         = setup(Config,
  213:                 [{logger,
  214:                   [{handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,logger_std_h,
  215:                     #{config=>#{type=>{file,Log}}}}]}]),
  216:     check_default_log(Node,Log,
  217:                       file,% dest
  218:                       0),% progress in std logger
  219: 
  220:     notice = maps:get(level,P),
  221:     #{module:=logger_std_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  222:     all = maps:get(level,StdC),
  223:     StdFilters = maps:get(filters,StdC),
  224:     {domain,{_,{log,super,[otp,sasl]}}} = lists:keyfind(domain,1,StdFilters),
  225:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  226:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  227:     [] = ML,
  228:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  229: 
  230: logger_file_sasl_compatible(Config) ->
  231:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  232:     {ok, #{primary := P, handlers := Hs, module_levels := ML}, Peer, Node}
  233:         = setup(Config,
  234:                 [{logger_sasl_compatible,true},
  235:                  {logger,
  236:                   [{handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,logger_std_h,
  237:                     #{config=>#{type=>{file,Log}}}}]}]),
  238:     check_default_log(Node,Log,
  239:                       file,% dest
  240:                       0),% progress in std logger
  241: 
  242:     info = maps:get(level,P),
  243:     #{module:=logger_std_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  244:     all = maps:get(level,StdC),
  245:     StdFilters = maps:get(filters,StdC),
  246:     {domain,{_,{log,super,[otp]}}} = lists:keyfind(domain,1,StdFilters),
  247:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  248:     true = exists(sasl,Hs),
  249:     [] = ML,
  250:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  251: 
  252: logger_file_log_progress(Config) ->
  253:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  254:     {ok, #{primary := P, handlers := Hs, module_levels := ML}, Peer, Node}
  255:         = setup(Config,
  256:                 [{logger_level,info},
  257:                  {logger,
  258:                   [{handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,logger_std_h,
  259:                     #{config=>#{type=>{file,Log}}}}]}]),
  260:     check_default_log(Node,Log,
  261:                       file,% dest
  262:                       6,% progress in std logger
  263:                       info),
  264: 
  265:     info = maps:get(level,P),
  266:     #{module:=logger_std_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  267:     all = maps:get(level,StdC),
  268:     StdFilters = maps:get(filters,StdC),
  269:     {domain,{_,{log,super,[otp,sasl]}}} = lists:keyfind(domain,1,StdFilters),
  270:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  271:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  272:     [] = ML,
  273:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  274: 
  275: logger_file_no_filter(Config) ->
  276:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  277:     {ok, #{handlers := Hs}, Peer, Node}
  278:         = setup(Config,
  279:                 [{logger,
  280:                   [{handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,logger_std_h,
  281:                     #{filter_default=>log,filters=>[],
  282:                       config=>#{type=>{file,Log}}}}]}]),
  283:     check_default_log(Node,Log,
  284:                       file,% dest
  285:                       6),% progress in std logger
  286: 
  287:     #{module:=logger_std_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  288:     all = maps:get(level,StdC),
  289:     [] = maps:get(filters,StdC),
  290:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  291:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  292: 
  293:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  294: 
  295: logger_file_no_filter_level(Config) ->
  296:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  297:     {ok, #{handlers := Hs}, Peer, Node}
  298:         = setup(Config,
  299:                 [{logger,
  300:                   [{handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,logger_std_h,
  301:                     #{filters=>[],level=>error,
  302:                       config=>#{type=>{file,Log}}}}]}]),
  303:     check_default_log(Node,Log,
  304:                       file,% dest
  305:                       0,% progress in std logger
  306:                       error),% level
  307: 
  308:     #{module:=logger_std_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  309:     error = maps:get(level,StdC),
  310:     [] = maps:get(filters,StdC),
  311:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  312:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  313: 
  314:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  315: 
  316: logger_file_formatter(Config) ->
  317:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  318:     {ok, #{handlers := Hs}, Peer, Node}
  319:         = setup(Config,
  320:                 [{logger,
  321:                   [{handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,logger_std_h,
  322:                     #{filters=>[],
  323:                       formatter=>{logger_formatter,#{}},
  324:                       config=>#{type=>{file,Log}}}}]}]),
  325:     check_single_log(Node,Log,
  326:                      file,% dest
  327:                      6),% progress in std logger
  328: 
  329:     #{module:=logger_std_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  330:     all = maps:get(level,StdC),
  331:     [] = maps:get(filters,StdC),
  332:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  333:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  334: 
  335:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  336: 
  337: logger_filters(Config) ->
  338:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  339:     {ok, #{handlers := Hs, primary := P}, Peer, Node}
  340:         = setup(Config,
  341:                 [{logger_level,info},
  342:                  {logger,
  343:                   [{handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,logger_std_h,
  344:                     #{config=>#{type=>{file,Log}}}},
  345:                    {filters,log,[{stop_progress,{fun logger_filters:progress/2,stop}}]}
  346:                   ]}]),
  347:     check_default_log(Node,Log,
  348:                       file,% dest
  349:                       0,% progress in std logger
  350:                       info),
  351: 
  352:     #{module:=logger_std_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  353:     all = maps:get(level,StdC),
  354:     StdFilters = maps:get(filters,StdC),
  355:     {domain,{_,{log,super,[otp,sasl]}}} = lists:keyfind(domain,1,StdFilters),
  356:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  357:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  358:     LoggerFilters = maps:get(filters,P),
  359:     true = lists:keymember(stop_progress,1,LoggerFilters),
  360: 
  361:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  362: 
  363: logger_filters_stop(Config) ->
  364:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  365:     {ok, #{handlers := Hs, primary := P}, Peer, Node}
  366:         = setup(Config,
  367:                 [{logger_level,info},
  368:                  {logger,
  369:                   [{handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,logger_std_h,
  370:                     #{filters=>[],
  371:                       config=>#{type=>{file,Log}}}},
  372:                    {filters,stop,[{log_error,{fun logger_filters:level/2,{log,gt,info}}}]}
  373:                   ]}]),
  374:     check_default_log(Node,Log,
  375:                       file,% dest
  376:                       0,% progress in std logger
  377:                       info),
  378: 
  379:     #{module:=logger_std_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  380:     all = maps:get(level,StdC),
  381:     [] = maps:get(filters,StdC),
  382:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  383:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  384:     LoggerFilters = maps:get(filters,P),
  385:     true = lists:keymember(log_error,1,LoggerFilters),
  386: 
  387:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  388: 
  389: logger_module_level(Config) ->
  390:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  391:     {ok, #{handlers := Hs, module_levels := ModuleLevels}, Peer, Node}
  392:         = setup(Config,
  393:                 [{logger_level,info},
  394:                  {logger,
  395:                   [{handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,logger_std_h,
  396:                     #{config=>#{type=>{file,Log}}}},
  397:                    {module_level,error,[supervisor]}
  398:                   ]}]),
  399:     check_default_log(Node,Log,
  400:                       file,% dest
  401:                       3,% progress in std logger
  402:                       info),
  403: 
  404:     #{module:=logger_std_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  405:     all = maps:get(level,StdC),
  406:     StdFilters = maps:get(filters,StdC),
  407:     {domain,{_,{log,super,[otp,sasl]}}} = lists:keyfind(domain,1,StdFilters),
  408:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  409:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  410:     [{supervisor,error}] = ModuleLevels,
  411:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  412: 
  413: logger_disk_log(Config) ->
  414:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  415:     {ok, #{handlers := Hs}, Peer, Node}
  416:         = setup(Config,
  417:                 [{logger,
  418:                   [{handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,logger_disk_log_h,
  419:                     #{config=>#{file=>Log}}}]}]),
  420:     check_default_log(Node,Log,
  421:                       disk_log,% dest
  422:                       0),% progress in std logger
  423: 
  424:     #{module:=logger_disk_log_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  425:     all = maps:get(level,StdC),
  426:     StdFilters = maps:get(filters,StdC),
  427:     {domain,{_,{log,super,[otp,sasl]}}} = lists:keyfind(domain,1,StdFilters),
  428:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  429:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  430: 
  431:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  432: 
  433: logger_disk_log_formatter(Config) ->
  434:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  435:     {ok, #{handlers := Hs}, Peer, Node}
  436:         = setup(Config,
  437:                 [{logger,
  438:                   [{handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,logger_disk_log_h,
  439:                     #{filters=>[],
  440:                       formatter=>{logger_formatter,#{}},
  441:                       config=>#{file=>Log}}}]}]),
  442:     check_single_log(Node,Log,
  443:                      disk_log,% dest
  444:                      6),% progress in std logger
  445: 
  446:     #{module:=logger_disk_log_h} = StdC = find(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  447:     all = maps:get(level,StdC),
  448:     [] = maps:get(filters,StdC),
  449:     false = exists(simple,Hs),
  450:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  451: 
  452:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  453: 
  454: logger_undefined(Config) ->
  455:     {ok, #{handlers := Hs, primary := P}, Peer, _Node} =
  456:         setup(Config,[{logger,[{handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,undefined}]}]),
  457:     false = exists(?STANDARD_HANDLER,Hs),
  458:     #{module:=logger_simple_h} = SimpleC = find(simple,Hs),
  459:     all = maps:get(level,SimpleC),
  460:     notice = maps:get(level,P),
  461:     SimpleFilters = maps:get(filters,SimpleC),
  462:     {domain,{_,{log,super,[otp,sasl]}}} = lists:keyfind(domain,1,SimpleFilters),
  463:     false = exists(sasl,Hs),
  464:     ok = peer:stop(Peer).
  465: 
  466: 
  467: %% Test that we can add multiple handlers with the default first
  468: logger_many_handlers_default_first(Config) ->
  469:     LogErr = file(Config,logger_many_handlers_default_first_error),
  470:     LogInfo = file(Config,logger_many_handlers_default_first_info),
  471: 
  472:     logger_many_handlers(
  473:       Config,[{logger,
  474:                [{handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,logger_std_h,
  475:                  #{level=>error,
  476:                    filters=>[],
  477:                    formatter=>{logger_formatter,#{}},
  478:                    config=>#{type=>{file,LogErr}}}
  479:                 },
  480:                 {handler,info,logger_std_h,
  481:                  #{level=>info,
  482:                    filters=>[{level,{fun logger_filters:level/2,{stop,gteq,error}}}],
  483:                    config=>#{type=>{file,LogInfo}}}
  484:                 }
  485:                ]},
  486:               {logger_level,info}], LogErr, LogInfo, 6).
  487: 
  488: %% Test that we can add multiple handlers with the default last
  489: logger_many_handlers_default_last(Config) ->
  490:     LogErr = file(Config,logger_many_handlers_default_last_error),
  491:     LogInfo = file(Config,logger_many_handlers_default_last_info),
  492:     logger_many_handlers(
  493:       Config,[{logger,
  494:                [{handler,info,logger_std_h,
  495:                  #{level=>info,
  496:                    filters=>[{level,{fun logger_filters:level/2,{stop,gteq,error}}}],
  497:                    config=>#{type=>{file,LogInfo}}}
  498:                 },
  499:                 {handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,logger_std_h,
  500:                  #{level=>error,
  501:                    filters=>[],
  502:                    formatter=>{logger_formatter,#{}},
  503:                    config=>#{type=>{file,LogErr}}}
  504:                 }
  505:                ]},
  506:               {logger_level,info}], LogErr, LogInfo, 7).
  507: 
  508: %% Check that we can handle that an added logger has a broken filter
  509: %% This used to cause a deadlock.
  510: logger_many_handlers_default_last_broken_filter(Config) ->
  511:     LogErr = file(Config,logger_many_handlers_default_first_broken_filter_error),
  512:     LogInfo = file(Config,logger_many_handlers_default_first_broken_filter_info),
  513: 
  514:     logger_many_handlers(
  515:       Config,[{logger,
  516:                [{handler,info,logger_std_h,
  517:                  #{level=>info,
  518:                    filters=>[{broken,{fun logger_filters:level/2,broken_state}},
  519:                              {level,{fun logger_filters:level/2,{stop,gteq,error}}}],
  520:                    config=>#{type=>{file,LogInfo}}}
  521:                 },
  522:                 {handler,?STANDARD_HANDLER,logger_std_h,
  523:                  #{level=>error,
  524:                    filters=>[],
  525:                    formatter=>{logger_formatter,#{}},
  526:                    config=>#{type=>{file,LogErr}}}
  527:                 }
  528:                ]},
  529:               {logger_level,info}], LogErr, LogInfo, 7).
  530: 
  531: logger_many_handlers(Config, Env, LogErr, LogInfo, NumProgress) ->
  532:     {ok, _, Peer, Node} = setup(Config, Env),
  533:     check_single_log(Node,LogErr,
  534:                      file,% dest
  535:                      0,% progress in std logger
  536:                      error), % level
  537:     ok = rpc:call(Node,logger_std_h,filesync,[info]),
  538:     {ok, Bin} = file:read_file(LogInfo),
  539:     ct:log("Log content:~n~s",[Bin]),
  540:     match(Bin,<<"info:">>,NumProgress,info,info),
  541:     match(Bin,<<"notice:">>,1,notice,info),
  542:     match(Bin,<<"alert:">>,0,alert,info),
  543: 
  544:     peer:stop(Peer).
  545: 
  546: logger_proxy(Config) ->
  547:     %% assume current node runs with default settings
  548:     DefOpts = logger_olp:get_opts(logger_proxy),
  549:     {ok, _, Peer, Node} = setup(Config,
  550:                         [{logger,[{proxy,#{sync_mode_qlen=>0,
  551:                                            drop_mode_qlen=>2}}]}]),
  552:     Expected = DefOpts#{sync_mode_qlen:=0,
  553:                         drop_mode_qlen:=2},
  554:     Expected = rpc:call(Node,logger_olp,get_opts,[logger_proxy]),
  555:     Expected = rpc:call(Node,logger,get_proxy_config,[]),
  556: 
  557:     peer:stop(Peer).
  558: 
  559: logger_metadata(Config) ->
  560:     {ok,#{ primary := #{ metadata := #{ test := test } } }, Peer, _}
  561:         = setup(Config, [{logger_metadata,#{ test => test }}]),
  562: 
  563:     peer:stop(Peer).
  564: 
  565: sasl_compatible_false(Config) ->
  566:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  567:     {ok, _, Peer, Node} = setup(Config,
  568:                         [{error_logger,{file,Log}},
  569:                          {logger_sasl_compatible,false},
  570:                          {logger_level,info}]), % to get progress
  571:     check_default_log(Node,Log,
  572:                       file,% dest
  573:                       6,% progress in std logger
  574:                       info),
  575:     peer:stop(Peer).
  576: 
  577: sasl_compatible_false_no_progress(Config) ->
  578:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  579:     {ok, _, Peer, Node} = setup(Config,
  580:                         [{error_logger,{file,Log}},
  581:                          {logger_sasl_compatible,false}]),
  582:     check_default_log(Node,Log,
  583:                       file,% dest
  584:                       0),% progress in std logger
  585:     peer:stop(Peer).
  586: 
  587: sasl_compatible(Config) ->
  588:     Log = file(Config,?FUNCTION_NAME),
  589:     {ok, _, Peer, Node} = setup(Config,
  590:                         [{error_logger,{file,Log}},
  591:                          {sasl_compatible,true}]),
  592:     check_default_log(Node,Log,
  593:                       file,% dest
  594:                       0),% progress in std logger
  595:     peer:stop(Peer).
  596: 
  597: all_logger_level(Config) ->
  598:     [all_logger_level(Config,Level) || Level <- [none,
  599:                                                  emergency,
  600:                                                  alert,
  601:                                                  critical,
  602:                                                  error,
  603:                                                  warning,
  604:                                                  notice,
  605:                                                  info,
  606:                                                  debug,
  607:                                                  all]],
  608:     ok.
  609: 
  610: all_logger_level(Config,Level) ->
  611:     {ok, #{primary := #{level := Level}}, Peer, _Node} = setup(Config, [{logger_level, Level}]),
  612:     peer:stop(Peer).
  613: 
  614: bad_error_logger(Config) ->
  615:     error = setup(Config,[{error_logger,baddest}]).
  616: 
  617: bad_level(Config) ->
  618:     error = setup(Config,[{logger_level,badlevel}]).
  619: 
  620: bad_sasl_compatibility(Config) ->
  621:     error = setup(Config,[{logger_sasl_compatible,badcomp}]).
  622: 
  623: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  624: %%% Internal
  625: file(Config,Func) ->
  626:     filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
  627:                   lists:concat([Func,".log"])).
  628: 
  629: check_default_log(Node,Log,Dest,NumProgress) ->
  630:     check_default_log(Node,Log,Dest,NumProgress,notice).
  631: check_default_log(Node,Log,Dest,NumProgress,Level) ->
  632: 
  633:     {ok,Bin1,Bin2} = check_log(Node,Log,Dest),
  634: 
  635:     match(Bin1,<<"PROGRESS REPORT">>,NumProgress,info,Level),
  636:     match(Bin1,<<"ALERT REPORT">>,1,alert,Level),
  637:     match(Bin1,<<"INFO REPORT">>,0,notice,Level),
  638:     match(Bin1,<<"DEBUG REPORT">>,0,debug,Level),
  639: 
  640:     match(Bin2,<<"INFO REPORT">>,1,notice,Level),
  641:     match(Bin2,<<"DEBUG REPORT">>,0,debug,Level),
  642:     ok.
  643: 
  644: check_single_log(Node,Log,Dest,NumProgress) ->
  645:     check_single_log(Node,Log,Dest,NumProgress,notice).
  646: check_single_log(Node,Log,Dest,NumProgress,Level) ->
  647: 
  648:     {ok,Bin1,Bin2} = check_log(Node,Log,Dest),
  649: 
  650:     match(Bin1,<<"info:">>,NumProgress,info,Level),
  651:     match(Bin1,<<"alert:">>,1,alert,Level),
  652:     match(Bin1,<<"debug:">>,0,debug,Level),
  653: 
  654:     match(Bin2,<<"info:">>,NumProgress+1,info,Level),
  655:     match(Bin2,<<"debug:">>,0,debug,Level),
  656: 
  657:     ok.
  658: 
  659: check_log(Node,Log,Dest) ->
  660: 
  661:     ok = log(Node,alert,["dummy1"]),
  662:     ok = log(Node,debug,["dummy1"]),
  663: 
  664:     %% Check that there are progress reports (supervisor and
  665:     %% application_controller) and an error report (the call above) in
  666:     %% the log. There should not be any info reports yet.
  667:     {ok,Bin1} = sync_and_read(Node,Dest,Log),
  668:     ct:log("Log content:~n~s",[Bin1]),
  669: 
  670:     %% Then stop sasl and see that the info report from
  671:     %% application_controller is there
  672:     ok = rpc:call(Node,application,stop,[sasl]),
  673:     {ok,Bin2} = sync_and_read(Node,Dest,Log),
  674:     ct:log("Log content:~n~s",[Bin2]),
  675:     {ok,Bin1,Bin2}.
  676: 
  677: match(Bin,Pattern,0,_,_) ->
  678:     nomatch = re:run(Bin,Pattern,[{capture,none}]);
  679: match(Bin,Pattern,N,LogLevel,ConfLevel) ->
  680:     case logger:compare_levels(LogLevel,ConfLevel) of
  681:         lt -> match(Bin,Pattern,0,LogLevel,ConfLevel);
  682:         _ ->
  683:             {match,M} = re:run(Bin,Pattern,[{capture,all},global]),
  684:             N = length(M)
  685:     end.
  686: 
  687: find(Id,Handlers) ->
  688:     case lists:search(fun(#{id:=Id0}) when Id0=:=Id-> true;
  689:                          (_) -> false end,
  690:                       Handlers) of
  691:         {value,Config} ->
  692:             Config;
  693:         false ->
  694:             false
  695:     end.
  696: 
  697: exists(Id,Handlers) ->
  698:     case find(Id,Handlers) of
  699:         false ->
  700:             false;
  701:         _ ->
  702:             true
  703:     end.
